verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a fellowship, what a joy divine
What a blessedness, what a peace is mine
Leaning on the everlasting arms
O how sweet to talk in this pilgrim way
O how bright the path grows from day top day
Leaning on the everlasting arms
Leaning, leaning,
Safe and secure from all alarms
Leaning, leaning
Leaning on the everlasting arms
What have I to dread, what have I to fear
I have blessed peacde with my Lord so near
Leaning on the everlasting arms
